episode: My daughter just aced her SAT exam. My wife and I are incredibly excited for her.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: My daughter just got her SAT scores. She did amazing!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's fantastic news! You must be so proud of her accomplishments.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Unbelievably proud and excited for her. She's always wanted to go to an Ivy League school and now it looks like a real possibility.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's awesome! She's got a bright future ahead!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yep, my wife's grandfather went to Brown and I know my daughter has always wanted to follow in his footsteps a bit. He was a doctor,and she wants to be one too.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Sounds like she's on the right track! Fingers crossed for her journey to Brown.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I know. I don't want to get our hopes up too high, but it's fun to see the people in your life succeed at such a high level.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Indeed, it's truly fulfilling to witness such success. Best wishes!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Thanks, she's already started working on her applications.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's great! She's really on top of things. Good luck to her!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Oh yeah, she's nothing like me when it comes to stuff like this. I procrastinate everything, thankfully she's more like her mom than me when it comes to that stuff!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a great trait for her to have! She's already showing her independence.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I'm not sure that I'm ready for her independence though. She's still my little girl!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's quite the wait, but she's got this!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: We're going to be on pins and needles waiting to see if she gets accepted.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's hard to let go, but she'll always be your little girl at heart.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yeah, this is really a great time in our lives. I'm so thankful for my wife and daughter.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Cherish every moment; they're precious!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I try to. And I'm not even going to start stressing out about paying tuition yet. For now, I'm just going to gloat about having such a smarty pants kid!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Enjoy the moment! The future will sort itself out.
